extendedInfo.description: â» This becomes for FREE. Some functions are limited.It is the live wall paper which can display a clock on favorite wall paper. You can make the wall paper which is high quality only for yourself with simple operation!â You can change the clock position, color and can make original wall paper only for oneself!â This application supports the indication of the battery residual quantity. And you can locate a clock by changing the transparency without disturbing the wall paper.â I prepared for several kinds of themes to have a light user use it. You can make an original clock with a favorite thing choosing without troublesome work from this.â This application supports starting Apps by a tap. You can run favorite application by tapping a place putting nothing of the screen. (I can start the application of two kinds of right and left!)Tap menu> wall paper> live wall paper> custom clock ++ã» Indication of the clockã» Indication of the battery residual quantityã» I choose the placement theme of the indication itemã» I set a position, a color, transparency, the font of the indication itemã» I attach scenery to the indication itemã» Change of setting, the transparency of the background colorã» Application start (to two kinds) with the tapã» Setting of the original wall paperâ I coped with scroll of the wall paper. (only as for the pay version)â It was equipped with electric power saving, a speedup mode. It is recommended in one attaching great importance to battery consumption and movement (*The gap of up to 30 seconds occurs on the clock)Live wallpaper, clock, wallpaper, font, customization, theme, color, custom, size, resize, battery, editing, edit,simple, application folder
